62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:We used to compare the people as to who was better during the lifetime of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) . We used to regard Abu Bakr as the best, then `Umar, and then `Uthman

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ أَبِي بَكْرٍ بَعْدَ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The merits of Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه
